entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
